trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 数据的流。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> scans the first bytes of the stream looking for a byte order mark or other sign of encoding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 对流的前几个字节进行扫描，查找字节顺序标记或其他编码标志。

trans-unit.source: When encoding is determined, the encoding is used to continue reading the stream, and processing continues parsing the input as a stream of (Unicode) characters.
trans-unit.target: 在确定编码方式后，使用该编码方式继续读取流，而处理过程继续将输入内容分析为 (Unicode) 字符流。

trans-unit.source: An object that is used to read the XML data in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于读取数据流中所含数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no credentials is used to access any external resources such as a document type definition (DTD), entities, schemas, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不使用凭据用于访问任何外部资源，如文档类型定义 (DTD)、 实体、 架构和等等。

trans-unit.target: 如果你的解决方案面向.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更高版本，指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following methods to control which resources the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一来控制哪些资源<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>可以访问：

trans-unit.source: Restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 属性设置为 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> 对象限制 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 可访问的资源。

trans-unit.target: 如果你的解决方案面向.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更高版本，指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the following methods to control which resources the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一来控制哪些资源<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>可以访问：

trans-unit.source: Restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 属性设置为 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> 对象限制 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 可访问的资源。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Do not allow the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to open any external resources by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 属性设置为 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A>，不允许 `null` 打开任何外部资源。

trans-unit.source: The created <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object expands entity references and performs XML normalization of new line characters.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象扩展实体引用，并执行的新行字符的 XML 规范化。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that is wrapped around an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个验证<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>包装在周围的对象<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="reader" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> object specifies a conformance level that is not consistent with conformance level of the underlying reader.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> 对象指定的一致性级别与基础读取器的一致性级别不一致。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is in an <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Error" /> or <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 基础 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 处于 <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Error" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Closed" /> 状态。

trans-unit.source: The stream that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: 包含 XML 数据的流。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> scans the first bytes of the stream looking for a byte order mark or other sign of encoding.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 对流的前几个字节进行扫描，查找字节顺序标记或其他编码标志。

trans-unit.source: When encoding is determined, the encoding is used to continue reading the stream, and processing continues parsing the input as a stream of (Unicode) characters.
trans-unit.target: 在确定编码方式后，使用该编码方式继续读取流，而处理过程继续将输入内容分析为 (Unicode) 字符流。

trans-unit.source: The settings for the new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例的设置。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The base URI for the entity or document being read.
trans-unit.target: 正在读取的实体或文档的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** The base URI is used to resolve the relative URI of the XML document.
trans-unit.target: **安全说明** 基 URI 用于解析 XML 文档的相对 URI。

trans-unit.source: Do not use a base URI from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用来自非信任源的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance using the specified stream, base URI, and settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的流、基 URI 和设置创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: An object that is used to read the XML data in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于读取数据流中所含数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no credentials is used to access any external resources such as a document type definition (DTD), entities, schemas, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不使用凭据用于访问任何外部资源，如文档类型定义 (DTD)、 实体、 架构和等等。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, no default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> is provided.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 4.5.2，无默认值开始<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>提供。

trans-unit.source: If your solution targets the .NET Framework 4.5.2 or later versions, specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的解决方案面向.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更高版本，指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> object on the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> object is used to convert the path to a canonical data representation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> 对象上的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 对象用于将路径转换为规范化数据表示形式。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />, a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver" /> object is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则使用新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The settings for the new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例的设置。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The context information required to parse the XML fragment.
trans-unit.target: 分析 XML 片段所需的上下文信息.

trans-unit.source: The context information can include the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> to use, encoding, namespace scope, the current <c>xml:lang</c> and <c>xml:space</c> scope, base URI, and document type definition.
trans-unit.target: 上下文信息可以包括要使用的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />、编码、命名空间范围、当前的 <c>xml:lang</c> 和 <c>xml:space</c> 范围、基 URI 和文档类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance by using the specified URI, settings, and context information for parsing.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URI、设置和进行分析的上下文信息创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: An object that is used to read the XML data in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于读取数据流中所含数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no credentials is used to access any external resources such as a document type definition (DTD), entities, schemas, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不使用凭据用于访问任何外部资源，如文档类型定义 (DTD)、 实体、 架构和等等。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, no default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> is provided.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 4.5.2，无默认值开始<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>提供。

trans-unit.source: If your solution targets the .NET Framework 4.5.2 or later versions, specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的解决方案面向.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更高版本，指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access any locations that does not require authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>可以访问任何不需要身份验证的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> can access by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制的资源，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>可以访问通过设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.XmlResolver%2A>属性<xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>对象。

trans-unit.source: The created <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object expands entity references and performs XML normalization of new line characters.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象扩展实体引用，并执行的新行字符的 XML 规范化。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="inputUri" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="inputUri" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 没有足够的权限访问 XML 数据的位置。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current node is an empty element (for example, <c><MyElement/></c>).
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取一个值，该值指示当前节点是否为空元素（例如 <c><MyElement/></c>）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current node is an element (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> equals <see langword="XmlNodeType.Element" />) that ends with <c>/></c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果当前节点为元素 (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" />等于<see langword="XmlNodeType.Element" />) 的结尾<c> / > </c>; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the difference between the following:
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够确定下面各项之间的差异：

trans-unit.source: `<item num="123"/>` (`IsEmptyElement` is `true`).
trans-unit.target: `<item num="123"/>` (`IsEmptyElement`是`true`)。

trans-unit.source: `<item num="123"></item>` (`IsEmptyElement` is `false`, although element content is empty).
trans-unit.target: `<item num="123"></item>` (`IsEmptyElement`是`false`，尽管元素内容为空)。

trans-unit.source: A corresponding `EndElement` node is not generated for empty elements.
trans-unit.target: 相应`EndElement`节点不为空的元素生成。

trans-unit.source: If default content has been added to an element due to schema validation, `IsEmptyElement` still returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果已将默认内容添加到架构验证来说，由于元素`IsEmptyElement`仍会返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: It has no bearing on whether or not the element has a default value.
trans-unit.target: 它没有任何影响在该元素具有默认值。

trans-unit.source: In other words, `IsEmptyElement` simply reports whether or not the element in the source document had an end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，`IsEmptyElement`仅报告是否与源文档中的元素具有结束元素标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContent" /> finds a start tag or empty element tag; <see langword="false" /> if a node type other than <see langword="XmlNodeType.Element" /> was found.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContent" /> 找到开始标记或空元素标记，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果找到不同于 <see langword="false" /> 的节点类型，则为 <see langword="XmlNodeType.Element" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则读取器的位置未改变。

trans-unit.target: 在调用`MoveToAttribute`、 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Name%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.NamespaceURI%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Prefix%2A>属性反映该属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Both parameter values are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 两个参数值均为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the current node is a content (non-white space text, <see langword="CDATA" />, <see langword="Element" />, <see langword="EndElement" />, <see langword="EntityReference" />, or <see langword="EndEntity" />) node.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前节点是否是内容（非空白文本、<see langword="CDATA" />、<see langword="Element" />、<see langword="EndElement" />、<see langword="EntityReference" /> 或 <see langword="EndEntity" />）节点。

trans-unit.source: If the node is not a content node, the reader skips ahead to the next content node or end of file.
trans-unit.target: 如果此节点不是内容节点，则读取器向前跳至下一个内容节点或文件结尾。

trans-unit.source: It skips over nodes of the following type: <see langword="ProcessingInstruction" />, <see langword="DocumentType" />, <see langword="Comment" />, <see langword="Whitespace" />, or <see langword="SignificantWhitespace" />.
trans-unit.target: 它跳过以下类型的节点：<see langword="ProcessingInstruction" />、<see langword="DocumentType" />、<see langword="Comment" />、<see langword="Whitespace" /> 或 <see langword="SignificantWhitespace" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> of the current node found by the method or <see langword="XmlNodeType.None" /> if the reader has reached the end of the input stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法找到的当前节点的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" />；如果读取器已到达输入流的末尾，则为 <see langword="XmlNodeType.None" />。

trans-unit.source: If the current node is an attribute node, this method moves the reader back to the element that owns the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点是属性节点，则此方法将读取器移回拥有该属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContentAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContentAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to write code that can skip over random XML markup without breaking.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要编写代码，可以跳过但不会破坏的随机 XML 标记，这非常有用。

trans-unit.target: 和

trans-unit.target: 和

trans-unit.target: 和

trans-unit.target: 在输入流中遇到不正确的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously checks whether the current node is a content node.

trans-unit.target: 如果此节点不是内容节点，则读取器向前跳至下一个内容节点或文件结尾。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> of the current node found by the method or <see langword="XmlNodeType.None" /> if the reader has reached the end of the input stream.

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContent%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToContent%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the element that contains the current attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，移动到包含当前属性节点的元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is positioned on an attribute (the reader moves to the element that owns the attribute); <see langword="false" /> if the reader is not positioned on an attribute (the position of the reader does not change).
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在属性上（读取器移动到拥有该属性的元素），则为 <see langword="true" />；如果读取器未定位在属性上（读取器的位置不更改），则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to return to an element after navigating through its attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法在其属性导航后返回到该元素。

trans-unit.source: This method moves the reader to one of the following node types: `Element`, `DocumentType`, or `XmlDeclaration`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将读取器移动到以下节点类型之一： `Element`， `DocumentType`，或`XmlDeclaration`。

trans-unit.target: 如果属性存在（读取器移动到第一个属性），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />（读取器的位置不更改）。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，移动到下一个属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is a next attribute; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在下一个属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果没有其他属性，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点是元素节点，则此方法等效于<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToFirstAttribute%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If `MoveToNextAttribute` returns `true`, the reader moves to the next attribute; otherwise, the position of the reader does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果`MoveToNextAttribute`返回`true`，读取器移动到下一步属性; 否则，读取器的位置不会更改。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Element" /></term><description> The tag name.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Element" /></term><description> 标记名称。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="EntityReference" /></term><description> The name of the entity referenced.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> associated with this implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取与该实现关联的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlNameTable" /> enabling you to get the atomized version of a string within the node.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlNameTable" />，它使你能够获取该节点内字符串的原子化版本。

trans-unit.source: All node and attribute names returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> are atomized using the `NameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 从返回的所有节点和属性名称<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>使用原子化`NameTable`。

trans-unit.source: When the same name is returned multiple times (for example, `Customer`), then the same `String` object will be returned for that name.
trans-unit.target: 当多次返回相同的名称 (例如， `Customer`)，然后相同`String`为该名称将返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for you to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings instead of expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以编写高效的代码，未对象上而不是昂贵的字符串比较这些字符串的比较。

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> to read the first node.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>读取的第一个节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method sets the state of the XML reader to initiate <xref:System.Xml.ReadState> and moves through the XML file sequentially until it reaches the end of the file, at which point the method returns a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>方法设置要启动的 XML 读取器的状态<xref:System.Xml.ReadState>遍历 XML 文件按顺序直至其达到的文件，此时该方法返回的值的末尾`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method requires at least four bytes from the data stream in order to begin parsing.
trans-unit.target: 此方法需要至少四个字节从数据流才能开始分析。

trans-unit.source: If fewer than four bytes are returned and there is no more data in the stream, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回少于四个字节，并且在流中没有更多的数据，该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If there is more data in the stream, the method will block parsing until receipt of the fourth byte.
trans-unit.target: 如果在流中没有更多的数据，该方法将阻止分析直到收到的第四个字节。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an XML file and displays each of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例读取 XML 文件，并显示每个节点。

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the `items.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`items.xml`文件。

trans-unit.source: **Output:**
An error occurred while parsing the XML.
trans-unit.target: 分析 XML 时出错。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the next node from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取该流的下一个节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the next node was read successfully; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more nodes to read.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功读取了下一个节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果没有其他节点可读取，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, parses the attribute value into one or more <see langword="Text" />, <see langword="EntityReference" />, or <see langword="EndEntity" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，将属性值解析为一个或多个 <see langword="Text" />、<see langword="EntityReference" /> 或 <see langword="EndEntity" /> 节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are nodes to return.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可返回的节点，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the reader is not positioned on an attribute node when the initial call is made or if all the attribute values have been read.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行初始调用时读取器不是定位在属性节点上，或者如果已读取了所有属性值，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty attribute, such as, <c>misc=""</c>, returns <see langword="true" /> with a single node with a value of <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是空属性（如 <c>misc=""</c>），则返回 <see langword="true" />，同时返回值为 <see langword="String.Empty" /> 的单个节点。

trans-unit.source: Use this method after calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToAttribute%2A> to read through the text or entity reference nodes that make up the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法之后调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.MoveToAttribute%2A>通读构成的属性值的文本或实体引用节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Depth%2A> of the attribute value nodes is one plus the depth of the attribute node; it increments and decrements by one when you step into and out of general entity references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Depth%2A>属性值节点是一个加上属性节点的深度; 它递增和递减由一个单步执行和跳出执行常规实体引用时。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: The type of the value to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的值的类型。

trans-unit.source: **Note** With the release of the .NET Framework 3.5, the value of the <c>returnType</c> parameter can now be the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> type.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：随着 .NET Framework 3.5 的发布，<c>returnType</c> 参数的值现在可以是 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> object that is used to resolve any namespace prefixes related to type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 对象，用于解析与类型转换有关的任何命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: For example, this can be used when converting an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> object to an <c>xs:string</c>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> 对象转换为 <c>xs:string</c> 时可以使用此对象。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads the content as an object of the type specified.
trans-unit.target: 将内容作为指定类型的对象读取。

trans-unit.source: The concatenated text content or attribute value converted to the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 已转换为请求类型的串联文本内容或属性值。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the text content at the current reader position and converts it to the requested return type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取读取器当前位置的文本内容，并将其转换为所请求的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Text, white space, significant white space and CDATA sections are concatenated.
trans-unit.target: 文本、空白、有效空白和 CDATA 节串联在一起。

trans-unit.source: Comments and processing instructions are skipped and entity references are automatically resolved.
trans-unit.target: 跳过注释和处理指令，并自动解析实体引用。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to read, convert if necessary, and return atomic value items from the current node content.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于读取、 将转换如有必要，以及返回当前节点中的原子值项内容。

trans-unit.source: If the input type is a valid mappings for the type of the current node then an instance of the target type containing the value of the current node is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回输入的类型是否为有效的映射的当前节点然后包含当前节点的值的目标类型的实例的类型。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> referencepage for a list of the default mappings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注部分中的<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>referencepage 有关默认映射的列表。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you had the following XML text:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有以下 XML 文本：

trans-unit.source: If the data is typed and a string array is supplied to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A> method call, then the integer values are converted from strings according to the list of valid CLR type mappings.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据类型化和一个字符串数组，提供给<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A>从根据有效的 CLR 类型映射的列表的字符串转换方法调用，则整数值。

trans-unit.source: If the data is untyped and a string array is supplied to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A> method call, then the content is parsed into separate strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据将非类型化，并且一个字符串数组，提供给<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A>方法调用，则内容将被分析为单独的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An array containing two strings is returned with the values "123" and "456".
trans-unit.target: 包含两个字符串的数组被返回"123"和"456"的值。

trans-unit.source: The spaces are not preserved from the content.
trans-unit.target: 从内容不保留空格。

trans-unit.source: In general when reading untyped data the content is parsed according to the supplied type.
trans-unit.target: 通常在读取非类型化的数据的内容被分析根据所提供的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an integer array is supplied to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A> method call then the string is parsed into an array of integers {123,456}.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个整数数组提供给<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A>方法调用，则字符串解析为整数 的数组。

trans-unit.source: In the following example the XML text is not separated by spaces
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例 XML 文本不是由空格分隔

trans-unit.source: If the content is untyped and a string array is supplied to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A> method call then an array containing one concatenated string is returned with the value "123456789".
trans-unit.target: 如果有非类型化的内容和一个字符串数组，提供给<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAs%2A>方法然后调用包含一个具有值"123456789"返回串联的字符串的数组。

trans-unit.target: 下表描述了此方法如何处理每个节点类型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Undefined, although typically the reader remains in the current position.
trans-unit.target: 未定义，尽管通常读取器将保留在当前位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Reads the content and returns the Base64 decoded binary bytes.
trans-unit.target: 读取内容并返回 Base64 解码的二进制字节。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method streams the content, decodes the `Base64` content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `Base64` encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内容流式处理，将解码`Base64`内容，并返回已解码的二进制字节 (例如，内联`Base64`编码的 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text.
trans-unit.target: 可以连续调用此方法，以读取大的嵌入文本流。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies".
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 机制来指定以及描述 Internet 消息正文的格式"。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119).
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119)。

trans-unit.source: You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> method until the method returns the value `0`.
trans-unit.target: 不应访问的任何读取器属性之间调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>方法，直到该方法返回值`0`。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有以下行为：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> returns the value `0` when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> 返回的值`0`时它已达到它正在操作的字节流的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on the first non-content node.
trans-unit.target: 读取器定位在的第一个非内容节点上。

trans-unit.source: If you ask for fewer, or the exact number of, bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要求更少，或的字节数比流读取器将保留在当前位置中剩余的精确数目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> is not supported on the following XML node types: `Element`, `XmlDeclaration`, `None`, `Document`, `DocumentType`, `Notation`, `Entity`, `DocumentFragment`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> 不支持对以下 XML 节点类型： `Element`， `XmlDeclaration`， `None`， `Document`， `DocumentType`， `Notation`， `Entity`， `DocumentFragment`。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64Async%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64Async%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的索引或者索引与计数之和大于分配的缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实现不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the content and returns the Base64 decoded binary bytes.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取内容并返回 Base64 解码的二进制字节。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Reads the content and returns the <see langword="BinHex" /> decoded binary bytes.
trans-unit.target: 读取内容并返回 <see langword="BinHex" /> 解码的二进制字节。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method streams the content, decodes the `BinHex` content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `BinHex` encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的内容流式处理，将解码`BinHex`内容，并返回已解码的二进制字节 (例如，内联`BinHex`编码的 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text.
trans-unit.target: 可以连续调用此方法，以读取大的嵌入文本流。

trans-unit.source: You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> method until the method returns the value `0`.
trans-unit.target: 不应访问的任何读取器属性之间调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>方法，直到该方法返回值`0`。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有以下行为：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> returns the value `0` when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> 返回的值`0`时它已达到它正在操作的字节流的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on the first non-content node.
trans-unit.target: 读取器定位在的第一个非内容节点上。

trans-unit.source: If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position.
trans-unit.target: 如果你请求更少，或者在当前位置保持的字节数比流中读取器剩余的精确数目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> is not supported on the following XML node types: `Element`, `XmlDeclaration`, `None`, `Document`, `DocumentType`, `Notation, Entity`, `DocumentFragment`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> 不支持对以下 XML 节点类型： `Element`， `XmlDeclaration`， `None`， `Document`， `DocumentType`， `Notation, Entity`， `DocumentFragment`。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHexAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHexAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的索引或者索引与计数之和大于分配的缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实现不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the content and returns the <see langword="BinHex" /> decoded binary bytes.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取内容并返回 <see langword="BinHex" /> 解码的二进制字节。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: Reads the text content at the current position as a <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为 <see langword="Boolean" /> 读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 对象的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将文本、 空白、 有效空白和 CDATA 节连接在一起，并跳过任何注释或处理指令。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用将自动解决。

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader returns an unboxed <xref:System.Boolean> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型`xsd:boolean`，则读取器返回取消装箱<xref:System.Boolean>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader attempts to convert it to a <xref:System.Boolean> object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:boolean`，读取器将尝试将其转换为<xref:System.Boolean>根据定义的规则的对象[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: You cannot rely on the <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value when the content is typed as `xsd:gMonthDay`.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型化为 <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则不能使用 `xsd:gMonthDay` 值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> always sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value to 1904 in this case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 始终设置<xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在这种情况下为 1904年值。

trans-unit.source: Reads the text content at the current position as a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为双精度浮点数读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 作为双精度浮点数的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将文本、 空白、 有效空白和 CDATA 节连接在一起，并跳过任何注释或处理指令。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用将自动解决。

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed `xsd:double`, the reader returns a double-precision floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型`xsd:double`，则读取器返回的双精度浮点数。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:double`, the reader attempts to convert it to a double-precision floating-point number according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:double`，读取器将尝试将其转换为双精度浮点数，根据定义的规则[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: Reads the text content at the current position as a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为 32 位有符号整数读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 作为 32 位有符号整数的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions.

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed `xsd:integer`, the reader returns an unboxed 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型`xsd:integer`，则读取器返回的未装箱的 32 位有符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:integer`, the reader attempts to convert it to a 32-bit signed integer according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:integer`，读取器将尝试将其转换为 32 位有符号整数，根据定义的规则[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."

trans-unit.source: Reads the text content at the current position as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as the most appropriate common language runtime (CLR) object.
trans-unit.target: 作为最适当的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将文本、 空白、 有效空白和 CDATA 节连接在一起，并跳过任何注释或处理指令。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用将自动解决。

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed, the reader returns a boxed CLR of the most appropriate type, specified by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型，则读取器返回由指定的最适当类型的装箱的 CLR<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ValueType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the content is a list type, the reader returns an array of boxed objects of the appropriate type.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容是列表类型，则读取器返回适当类型的装箱对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: If a validation error occurs while parsing the content and the reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method, the reader returns the content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果出现验证错误时分析内容时，读卡器<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>创建对象<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>方法，则读取器返回作为字符串的内容。

trans-unit.source: In other words when a validation error or warning occurs, the content is considered to be untyped.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之验证错误或警告时，内容被视为非类型化。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed, the reader returns the content as a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化，读取器将以字符串的形式返回内容。

trans-unit.source: The string format is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串格式无效。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the text content at the current position as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 对象异步读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as the most appropriate common language runtime (CLR) object.
trans-unit.target: 作为最适当的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsObject%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsObject%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: Reads the text content at the current position as a <see cref="T:System.String" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前位置的文本内容作为 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象读取。

trans-unit.source: The text content as a <see cref="T:System.String" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将文本、 空白、 有效空白和 CDATA 节连接在一起，并跳过任何注释或处理指令。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically resolved.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用将自动解决。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used convert typed values to a string, or to read the text content while skipping comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法将类型化的值转换为字符串，或时跳过注释和处理指令，读取的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how this method treats each node type.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了此方法如何处理每个节点类型。

trans-unit.source: XmlNodeType
trans-unit.target: XmlNodeType

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: Reader behavior
trans-unit.target: 读取器行为

trans-unit.source: Concatenated content of text, CDATA, white space and significant white space nodes converted to the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 将文本、CDATA、空白和有效空白节点的串联内容转换为所请求的类型。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next start element or end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 移至下一个开始元素或结束元素标记。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用自动展开。

trans-unit.source: Same as calling `XmlConvert.ToXxx` on the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 与调用相同`XmlConvert.ToXxx`上属性值。

trans-unit.source: The reader remains in the current position.
trans-unit.target: 读取器仍保留在当前位置。

trans-unit.source: Ignores the processing instruction (PI) or comment and reads the concatenated text content that follows the PI or comment.
trans-unit.target: 忽略处理指令 (PI) 或注释，读取 PI 或注释后面的串联文本内容。

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next start element or end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 移至下一个开始元素或结束元素标记。

trans-unit.source: Entity references are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 实体引用自动展开。

trans-unit.source: An empty string.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The reader remains in the current position.
trans-unit.target: 读取器仍保留在当前位置。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Undefined, although typically the reader remains in the current position.
trans-unit.target: 未定义，尽管通常读取器将保留在当前位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reference page and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.

trans-unit.source: Reads the current element and returns the contents as an object of the type specified.
trans-unit.target: 读取当前元素，并将内容作为指定类型的对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的值的类型。

trans-unit.source: **Note** With the release of the .NET Framework 3.5, the value of the <c>returnType</c> parameter can now be the <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> type.
trans-unit.target: **注意**：随着 .NET Framework 3.5 的发布，<c>returnType</c> 参数的值现在可以是 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> object that is used to resolve any namespace prefixes related to type conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 对象，用于解析与类型转换有关的任何命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: Reads the element content as the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 将元素内容作为请求类型读取。

trans-unit.source: The element content converted to the requested typed object.
trans-unit.target: 转换为请求类型的对象的元素内容。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取开始标记，该元素的内容，并将移过结束元素标记读取器。

trans-unit.source: It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments.
trans-unit.target: 扩展实体并将忽略处理指令和注释。

trans-unit.source: The element can only contain simple content.
trans-unit.target: 元素只能包含简单内容。

trans-unit.source: That is, it cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reference page and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分的<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>引用页和[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver" /> 对象，用于解析与类型转换有关的任何命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.target: 元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified local name and namespace URI matches that of the current element, then reads the element content as the requested type.

trans-unit.target: 此方法读取开始标记，该元素的内容，并将移过结束元素标记读取器。

trans-unit.source: That is, it cannot have child elements.

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.target: 当前元素包含子元素。

trans-unit.target: 使用 <see langword="null" /> 参数调用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 指定的本地名称和命名空间 URI 与所读取的当前元素的本地名称和命名空间 URI 不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Read <see langword="Decimal.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 读取 <see langword="Decimal.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the value to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的值的类型。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the element content as the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 将元素内容作为请求类型异步读取。

trans-unit.source: The element content converted to the requested typed object.
trans-unit.target: 转换为请求类型的对象的元素内容。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Reads the element and decodes the <see langword="Base64" /> content.
trans-unit.target: 读取元素并对 <see langword="Base64" /> 内容进行解码。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the element content, decodes it using `Base64` encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `Base64`-encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取元素内容，将使用其解码`Base64`编码，并返回已解码的二进制字节 (例如，内联`Base64`-编码的 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies".
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 机制来指定以及描述 Internet 消息正文的格式"。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119).
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A> can only read simple-content elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A> 只能读取简单内容元素。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 该元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 节、 注释和处理指令。

trans-unit.source: It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以包含实体引用自动展开。

trans-unit.source: The element cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 元素不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> method except that it can only be called on element node types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是非常类似于<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>方法，但它只能在元素节点类型上调用。

trans-unit.source: If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`值高于在文档中，字节数是否等于在文档中，字节数或<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>读取文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the `EndElement`.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>方法调用将返回零，并将读取器移动到节点以下`EndElement`。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>消耗了全部元素内容时之前，读取器的行为类似于第一个内容已被用尽，然后<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>调用了方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着读取器将读取的所有文本，直到遇到 end 元素。

trans-unit.source: It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将读取结束标记节点、 读取下一个节点，然后将自身定位在下一步的后续节点。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64Async%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64Async%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an inline `Base64` encoded image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例读取一个内联`Base64`编码的图像。

trans-unit.source: The `Base64` data is embedded within the `<image>` element.
trans-unit.target: `Base64`数据嵌入在`<image>`元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> is used to create a new binary data file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>用于创建新的二进制数据文件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: 无法将内容转换成请求的类型。

trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the element and decodes the <see langword="Base64" /> content.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取元素并对 <see langword="Base64" /> 内容进行解码。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 结果文本复制到的缓冲区。

trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移，从这个位置开始将结果复制到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.

trans-unit.source: Reads the element and decodes the <see langword="BinHex" /> content.
trans-unit.target: 读取元素并对 <see langword="BinHex" /> 内容进行解码。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 写入缓冲区的字节数。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the element content, decodes it using `BinHex` encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `BinHex`-encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取元素内容，将使用其解码`BinHex`编码，并返回已解码的二进制字节 (例如，内联`BinHex`-编码的 GIF 图像) 到缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method can only read simple-content elements.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能读取简单内容元素。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 该元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 节、 注释和处理指令。

trans-unit.source: It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以包含实体引用自动展开。

trans-unit.source: The element cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 元素不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> method except that it can only be called on element node types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是非常类似于<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>方法，但它只能在元素节点类型上调用。

trans-unit.source: If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`值高于在文档中，字节数是否等于在文档中，字节数或<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>读取文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the `EndElement`.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>方法调用将返回零，并将读取器移动到节点以下`EndElement`。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>消耗了全部元素内容时之前，读取器的行为类似于第一个内容已被用尽，然后<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>调用了方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着读取器将读取的所有文本，直到遇到 end 元素。

trans-unit.source: It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将读取结束标记节点、 读取下一个节点，然后将自身定位在下一步的后续节点。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBinHexAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBinHexAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an inline `BinHex` encoded image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例读取一个内联`BinHex`编码的图像。

trans-unit.source: The `BinHex` data is embedded within the `<image>` element.
trans-unit.target: `BinHex`数据嵌入在`<image>`元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> is used to create a new binary data file.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>用于创建新的二进制数据文件。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取开始标记，该元素的内容，并将移过结束元素标记读取器。

trans-unit.source: It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments.
trans-unit.target: 扩展实体并将忽略处理指令和注释。

trans-unit.source: The element can only contain simple content.
trans-unit.target: 元素只能包含简单内容。

trans-unit.source: That is, it cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: If the element content is typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader returns an unboxed <xref:System.Boolean> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定类型的元素内容`xsd:boolean`，则读取器返回取消装箱<xref:System.Boolean>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader attempts to convert it to a <xref:System.Boolean> object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:boolean`，读取器将尝试将其转换为<xref:System.Boolean>根据定义的规则的对象[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the specified local name and namespace URI matches that of the current element, then reads the current element and returns the contents as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 检查指定的本地名称和命名空间 URI 与当前元素的本地名称和命名空间 URI 是否匹配，然后读取当前元素，并将内容作为 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The element contents as a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的元素内容。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取开始标记，该元素的内容，并将移过结束元素标记读取器。

trans-unit.source: It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments.
trans-unit.target: 扩展实体并将忽略处理指令和注释。

trans-unit.source: The element can only contain simple content.
trans-unit.target: 元素只能包含简单内容。

trans-unit.source: That is, it cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed `xsd:dateTime`, the reader returns an unboxed <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型`xsd:dateTime`，则读取器返回取消装箱<xref:System.DateTime>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:dateTime`, the reader attempts to convert it to a <xref:System.DateTime> object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:dateTime`，读取器将尝试将其转换为<xref:System.DateTime>根据定义的规则的对象[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: You cannot rely on the <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value when the content is typed as `xsd:gMonthDay`.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型化为 <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则不能使用 `xsd:gMonthDay` 值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> always sets the <xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value to 1904 in this case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 始终设置<xref:System.DateTime.Year%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在这种情况下为 1904年值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Remarks section of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> reference page.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 引用页的“备注”部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取开始标记，该元素的内容，并将移过结束元素标记读取器。

trans-unit.source: It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments.
trans-unit.target: 扩展实体并将忽略处理指令和注释。

trans-unit.source: The element can only contain simple content.
trans-unit.target: 元素只能包含简单内容。

trans-unit.source: That is, it cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，它不能有子元素。

trans-unit.source: If the content is typed `xsd:integer`, the reader returns an unboxed 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容类型`xsd:integer`，则读取器返回的未装箱的 32 位有符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: If the content is not typed `xsd:integer`, the reader attempts to convert it to a 32-bit signed integer according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容未类型化`xsd:integer`，读取器将尝试将其转换为 32 位有符号整数，根据定义的规则[W3C XML 架构第 2 部分： 数据类型](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建议。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads all the content, including markup, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，将所有内容（包括标记）当做字符串读取。

trans-unit.source: All the XML content, including markup, in the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点中的所有 XML 内容（包括标记）。

trans-unit.source: If the current node has no children, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点没有任何子级，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the current node is neither an element nor attribute, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点既非元素，也非属性，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method returns all the content of the current node including the markup.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回当前节点包括的标记中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The current node (start tag) and corresponding end node (end tag) are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 不返回当前节点（开始标记）和对应的结束节点（结束标记）。

trans-unit.target: `ReadInnerXml` 返回 `this <child id="123"/>`

trans-unit.source: This method handles element and attribute nodes in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可按以下方式处理元素和属性节点：

trans-unit.source: Node type
trans-unit.target: 节点类型

trans-unit.source: Position before the call
trans-unit.target: 调用前的位置

trans-unit.source: XML fragment
trans-unit.target: XML 片断

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: Position after the call
trans-unit.target: 在调用后的位置

trans-unit.source: On the `item1` start tag.
trans-unit.target: 在 `item1` 开始标记上。

trans-unit.source: \<item1>text1\</item1>\<item2>text2\</item2>
trans-unit.target: \<item1>text1\</item1>\<item2>text2\</item2>

trans-unit.source: text1
trans-unit.target: text1

trans-unit.source: On the `item2` start tag.
trans-unit.target: 在 `item2` 开始标记上。

trans-unit.source: On the `attr1` attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 在 `attr1` 属性节点上。

trans-unit.source: \<item attr1="val1" attr2="val2">text\</item>
trans-unit.target: \<item attr1="val1" attr2="val2">text\</item>

trans-unit.source: val1
trans-unit.target: val1

trans-unit.source: Remains on the `attr1` attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 保留在 `attr1` 属性节点上。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node, calling `ReadInnerXml` is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在叶节点上，则调用 `ReadInnerXml` 等效于调用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The method returns `String.Empty` (except for attribute nodes, in which case the value of the attribute is returned).
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回`String.Empty`（特性节点除外，在这种情况下返回的属性的值）。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会检查格式正确的 XML。

trans-unit.source: If `ReadInnerXml` is called from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, this method also validates the content returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ReadInnerXml`从调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，此方法还将验证返回的内容。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> and `XmlValidatingReader` classes the `ReadOuterXml` method is namespace aware.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>，<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>和`XmlValidatingReader`类`ReadOuterXml`方法可以识别命名空间。

trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadInnerXmlAsync%2A>。
