trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads all the content, including markup, as a string.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取所有内容，包括作为字符串的标记。

trans-unit.source: All the XML content, including markup, in the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点中的所有 XML 内容（包括标记）。

trans-unit.source: If the current node has no children, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点没有任何子级，则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadInnerXml%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadInnerXml%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads the content, including markup, representing this node and all its children.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，读取表示该节点和所有它的子级的内容（包括标记）。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an element or an attribute node, this method returns all the XML content, including markup, of the current node and all its children; otherwise, it returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在元素或属性节点上，此方法将返回当前节点及其所有子级的所有 XML 内容（包括标记）；否则返回空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadInnerXml%2A> except it also returns the start and end tags.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadInnerXml%2A>但它还返回的开始和结束标记。

trans-unit.source: This method handles element and attribute nodes in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可按以下方式处理元素和属性节点：

trans-unit.source: Node type
trans-unit.target: 节点类型

trans-unit.source: Position before the call
trans-unit.target: 调用前的位置

trans-unit.source: XML fragment
trans-unit.target: XML 片断

trans-unit.source: Return value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: Position After the Call
trans-unit.target: 在调用后的位置

trans-unit.source: On the `item1` start tag.
trans-unit.target: 在 `item1` 开始标记上。

trans-unit.source: \<item1>text1\</item1>\<item2>text2\</item2>
trans-unit.target: \<item1>text1\</item1>\<item2>text2\</item2>

trans-unit.source: \<item1>text1\</item1>
trans-unit.target: \<item1>text1\</item1>

trans-unit.source: On the `item2` start tag.
trans-unit.target: 在 `item2` 开始标记上。

trans-unit.source: On the `attr1` attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 在 `attr1` 属性节点上。

trans-unit.source: \<item attr1="val1" attr2="val2">text\</item>
trans-unit.target: \<item attr1="val1" attr2="val2">text\</item>

trans-unit.source: attr1="val1"
trans-unit.target: attr1="val1"

trans-unit.source: Remains on the `attr1` attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 保留在 `attr1` 属性节点上。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node, calling `ReadOuterXml` is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在叶节点上，则调用 `ReadOuterXml` 等效于调用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The method returns `String.Empty` (except for attribute nodes, in which case the attribute markup is returned).
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回`String.Empty`（特性节点除外，在这种情况下返回的属性标记）。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会检查格式正确的 XML。

trans-unit.source: If `ReadOuterXml` is called from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, this method also validates the content returned
trans-unit.target: 如果`ReadOuterXml`从调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，此方法还将验证返回的内容

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> and `XmlValidatingReader` classes the `ReadOuterXml` method is namespace aware.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>，<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>和`XmlValidatingReader`类`ReadOuterXml`方法可以识别命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Given the following XML text `hello`, if the reader were positioned on the `S:B` start tag, `ReadOuterXml` returns `hello`.
trans-unit.target: 给定以下 XML 文本`hello`，如果读取器定位在`S:B`开始标记，`ReadOuterXml`返回`hello`。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadOuterXmlAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadOuterXmlAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message “An asynchronous operation is already in progress.”
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中”。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the current node is an element and advances the reader to the next node.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前节点是否为元素并将读取器推进到下一个节点。

trans-unit.target: 检查当前节点是否为元素并将读取器推进到下一个节点。

trans-unit.target: 元素的限定名。

trans-unit.source: A call to this method corresponds to a call to <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.IsStartElement%2A> followed by a call to <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the state of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取读取器的状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the state of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 指定读取器的状态的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> property has one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>属性具有以下值之一：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>, when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>当<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Interactive>, when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method has been called, and additional methods may be called on the reader.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Interactive>当<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>已调用方法，并且可能在读取器上调用其他方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.EndOfFile>, when the end of the XML document has been reached successfully.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.EndOfFile>已在成功到达 XML 文档的结尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Closed>, when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Closed>当<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Close%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Error>, when an error is preventing the read operation from continuing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Error>当发生错误，无法读取的安装程序无法继续。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads the contents of an element or text node as a string.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，将元素或文本节点的内容当做字符串读取。

trans-unit.source: However, we recommend that you use the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsString" /> method instead, because it provides a more straightforward way to handle this operation.
trans-unit.target: 但是，建议改用 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsString" /> 方法，因为该方法可以更直接地处理此操作。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the element or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 元素的内容或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsString%2A> method to read the contents of an element or text node as a string.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsString%2A>方法来读取元素或文本节点作为字符串的内容。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while parsing the XML.
trans-unit.target: 分析 XML 时出错。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see langword="XmlReader" /> instance that can be used to read the current node, and all its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 返回新的 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 实例，此实例可用于读取当前节点及其所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: A new XML reader instance set to <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see cref="F:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial" /> 的新 XML 实例。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read" /> method positions the new reader on the node that was current before the call to the <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read" /> 方法时，会将新的读取器定位在调用 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree" /> 方法之前的当前节点上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> can be called only on element nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> 可以仅在元素节点上调用。

trans-unit.source: When the entire sub-tree has been read, calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当已读取整个子树时，调用到<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the new XML reader has been closed, the original readeris positioned on the `EndElement` node of the sub-tree.
trans-unit.target: 当新的 XML 读取器已关闭，位于原始 readeris`EndElement`节点的子树。

trans-unit.source: Thus, if you called the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> method on the start tag of the book element, after the sub-tree has been read and the new XML reader has been closed, the original XML reader is positioned on the end tag of the book element.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>未关闭的书籍元素子树已读取和新的 XML 读取器之后开始标记上的方法，原始的 XML 读取器定位在的书籍元素的结束标记。

trans-unit.source: You should not perform any operations on the original reader until the new reader has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭新的读取器之前，不应对原始读取器执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: This action is not supported and can result in unpredictable behavior.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此操作，因为这样可能会导致意想不到的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> method isn't intended for creatingcopies of the XML data that you can work with independently.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>方法不适用于 creatingcopies 可以独立地使用 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: It's designedto create a boundary around an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 它的 designedto 创建 XML 元素周围的边界。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to pass data to another component for processing and you wish to limit how much of your data the component can access.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将数据传递给另一个组件进行处理，你想要限制组件可以访问你数据，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: When you pass an XML reader returned by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> method to another application, the application can access only that XML element, not the entire XML document.
trans-unit.target: 传递时，返回 XML 读取器<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>给另一个应用程序，应用程序的方法可以访问仅该 XML 元素，不是整个 XML 文档。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示如何使用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the following XML data to run the examples in this topic:
trans-unit.target: 使用下面的 XML 数据，若要运行本主题中的示例：

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message “An asynchronous operation is already in progress.”
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中”。

trans-unit.source: Advances the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to the next matching descendant element.
trans-unit.target: 让 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 前进到下一个匹配的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the element you wish to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移动到的元素的限定名。

trans-unit.source: Advances the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to the next descendant element with the specified qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 让 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 前进到下一个具有指定限定名的子代元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching descendant element is found; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的子代元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a matching child element is not found, the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is positioned on the end tag (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> is <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />) of the element.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到匹配的子元素，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 将定位在元素的结束标记（<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> 为 <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />）上。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is not positioned on an element when <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToDescendant(System.String)" /> was called, this method returns <see langword="false" /> and the position of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 时没有将 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToDescendant(System.String)" /> 定位在某个元素上，则此方法返回 <see langword="false" /> 且 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 的位置保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Reads until an element with the specified qualified name is found.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching element is found; otherwise <see langword="false" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is in an end of file state.

trans-unit.target: 此方法是功能上等效执行`following::name`从当前节点的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: It provides a quick way to find a named element in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了在 XML 文档中查找命名的元素的快速方法。

trans-unit.source: It advances the reader to the next following element that matches the specified name and returns `true` if a matching element is found.
trans-unit.target: 将读取器推进到下一步的后续元素，匹配的指定的名称，并返回`true`如果找到了匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: Using the example below, the reader would read to the first instance of the specified element while reading forward.
trans-unit.target: 使用下面的示例中，读取器将读取到指定的元素的第一个实例转发读取时。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called on all node types.
trans-unit.target: 可以在所有节点类型上调用此方法。

trans-unit.target: 一直读取，直到找到具有指定的本地名称和命名空间 URI 的元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching element is found; otherwise <see langword="false" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is in an end of file state.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" /> 且 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 位于文件的末尾。

trans-unit.source: This method is functionally equivalent executing the `following::name` XPath expression from the current node.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是功能上等效执行`following::name`从当前节点的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.target: 它提供了在 XML 文档中查找命名的元素的快速方法。

trans-unit.source: It advances the reader to the next following element that matches the specified name and returns `true` if a matching element is found.
trans-unit.target: 将读取器推进到下一步的后续元素，匹配的指定的名称，并返回`true`如果找到了匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called on all node types.
trans-unit.target: 可以在所有节点类型上调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message “An asynchronous operation is already in progress.”
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中”。

trans-unit.source: Advances the <see langword="XmlReader" /> to the next matching sibling element.
trans-unit.target: 让 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 前进到下一个匹配的同级元素。

trans-unit.source: The qualified name of the sibling element you wish to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移动到的同级元素的限定名。

trans-unit.source: Advances the <see langword="XmlReader" /> to the next sibling element with the specified qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 让 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 前进到下一个具有指定限定名的同级元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching sibling element is found; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的同级元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a matching sibling element is not found, the <see langword="XmlReader" /> is positioned on the end tag (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> is <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />) of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到匹配的同级元素，<see langword="XmlReader" /> 会定位在父元素的结束标记（<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> 为 <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />）上。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A> when the `XmlReader` is an initial state (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> is <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>).
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A>时`XmlReader`是初始状态 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>是<xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>)。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> to advance the `XmlReader` and then call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>向前移动`XmlReader`，然后调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads the ISBN attribute on each book node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例读取每个 book 节点上的 ISBN 属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: The parameter is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 参数是空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the sibling element you wish to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要移动到的同级元素的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the sibling element you wish to move to.
trans-unit.target: 你希望移动到的同级元素的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: Advances the <see langword="XmlReader" /> to the next sibling element with the specified local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 推进到具有指定的本地名称和命名空间 URI 的下一个同级元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a matching sibling element is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配的同级元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a matching sibling element is not found, the <see langword="XmlReader" /> is positioned on the end tag (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> is <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />) of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到匹配的同级元素，<see langword="XmlReader" /> 会定位在父元素的结束标记（<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> 为 <see langword="XmlNodeType.EndElement" />）上。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A> when the `XmlReader` is an initial state (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A> is <xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>).
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A>时`XmlReader`是初始状态 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadState%2A>是<xref:System.Xml.ReadState.Initial>)。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> to advance the `XmlReader` and then call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>向前移动`XmlReader`，然后调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadToNextSibling%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Both parameter values are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 两个参数值均为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters that serves as the buffer to which the text contents are written.
trans-unit.target: 作为文本内容写入到的缓冲区的字符数组。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset within the buffer where the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> can start to copy the results.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移量，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 可以从这个位置开始复制结果。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区中的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of characters copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字符数。

trans-unit.source: Reads large streams of text embedded in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 读取嵌入在 XML 文档中的大量文本流。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 读取到缓冲区中的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The value zero is returned when there is no more text content.
trans-unit.target: 如果不再有文本内容，则返回值零。

trans-unit.source: This method enables reading of very large streams of text embedded in an XML document in a streaming fashion, that is, a small number of characters at a time instead of allocating a single string for the whole value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可实现的非常大的流式处理方式，即，XML 文档中嵌入的文本流读取少量的字符而不是为整个值分配单个字符串的一次。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called on any node that has a value (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.HasValue%2A> is `true`), however actual streaming of the node value only occurs when called on a text, white space and significant white space nodes.
trans-unit.target: 可以具有值的任何节点上调用此方法 (<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.HasValue%2A>是`true`)，但实际流式处理的节点值仅在文本、 空白和有效空白节点上调用时出现。

trans-unit.source: Other node type values are cached, including attributes and CDATA nodes.
trans-unit.target: 其他节点类型值进行缓存，包括属性和 CDATA 节点。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only the content of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A> property and does not move the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的内容<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>属性并不会移动<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the specified number of characters (`count`) of the node value into a character buffer (`buffer`) at a specified offset (`index`) and returns the number of characters written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取指定的数目的字符 (`count`) 到字符缓冲区中的节点值 (`buffer`) 指定偏移量 (`index`) 并返回写入到缓冲区的字符数。

trans-unit.source: It returns the `0` when it has reached the end of the value.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回`0`时它已达到值的末尾。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be restarted to read through the value again.
trans-unit.target: 它不能重新启动才能再次读取该值。

trans-unit.source: In between calls to <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> properties do no change except for the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对的调用之间<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A><xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>属性不会更改除<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A> property is accessed it may either return a partial value (with characters not yet returned by <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>) or a full value depending on the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>访问属性时它也可能返回的部分值 (带有尚未返回的字符<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>) 或全部值，具体取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: All the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> implementations in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace return a partial value for the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A> property implementation.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>中的实现<xref:System.Xml>命名空间部分为返回值<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Value%2A>属性实现。

trans-unit.source: Any Read method can be called in between calls to <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 任何 Read 方法可以调用之间调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> moves to the next <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> in the stream and any characters not yet returned are skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生这种情况，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>移动到下<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>流和尚不返回任何字符中将跳过。

trans-unit.source: There may be a case when <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> returns less than the requested number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 可能有一种情况时<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>返回请求的字符数小于。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you had a 200-character long value with a surrogate pair at positions 127 and 128 and you called <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> with a 128-character buffer, the method call would return 127 characters instead of the requested 128.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在位置 127 和 128 使用代理项对有 200 个字符长整型值，你调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>与 128 个字符的缓冲区，该方法调用将返回而不是请求 128 127 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The surrogate pair would then be returned in the next <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 则将在下一步中返回的代理项对<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> did not return the requested 128 characters because doing so would have resulted in an incomplete surrogate pair at the end of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>未返回请求的 128 个字符，因为这样做因此将会造成缓冲区末尾的不完整的代理项对。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunkAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunkAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer, or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的索引或者索引与计数之和大于分配的缓冲区大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实现不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The XML data is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 数据不是格式良好的。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters that serves as the buffer to which the text contents are written.
trans-unit.target: 作为文本内容写入到的缓冲区的字符数组。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不能为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset within the buffer where the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> can start to copy the results.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区中的偏移量，<see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 可以从这个位置开始复制结果。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要复制到缓冲区中的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of characters copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回复制的实际字符数。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads large streams of text embedded in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 异步读取嵌入在 XML 文档中的大量文本流。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 读取到缓冲区中的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The value zero is returned when there is no more text content.
trans-unit.target: 如果不再有文本内容，则返回值零。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, resolves the entity reference for <see langword="EntityReference" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，解析 <see langword="EntityReference" /> 节点的实体引用。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an `EntityReference` node (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`), if <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A> is called after calling this method, the entity replacement text is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在`EntityReference`节点 (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`)，如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>称为之后调用此方法，实体替换文本进行分析。

trans-unit.source: When the entity replacement text is finished, an `EndEntity` node is returned to close the entity reference scope.
trans-unit.target: 完成实体替换文本后，`EndEntity`将返回节点关闭实体引用作用域。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, if the entity is part of an attribute value, you must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A> to step into the entity.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，如果实体为一部分的属性值时，你必须调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A>以单步执行该实体。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema information that has been assigned to the current node as a result of schema validation.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为架构验证结果分配给当前节点的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> object containing the schema information for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含当前节点的架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Schema information can be set on elements, attributes, or on text nodes with a non-null <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.ValueType" /> (typed values).
trans-unit.target: 架构信息可以在元素、特性或具有非空 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.ValueType" />（类型化值）的文本节点上设置。

trans-unit.source: If the current node is not one of the above node types, or if the <see langword="XmlReader" /> instance does not report schema information, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前节点不属于上述节点类型，或者如果 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 实例未报告架构信息，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is called from an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader" /> object, this property always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果从 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader" /> 对象调用此属性，则此属性总是返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: These <see langword="XmlReader" /> implementations do not expose schema information through the <see langword="SchemaInfo" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 这些 <see langword="XmlReader" /> 实现不会通过 <see langword="SchemaInfo" /> 属性公开架构信息。

trans-unit.source: If you have to get the post-schema-validation information set (PSVI) for an element, position the reader on the end tag of the element, rather than on the start tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须为某个元素获取架构验证后信息集 (PSVI)，请在此元素的结束标记处（而不是在开始标记处）放置读取器。

trans-unit.source: You get the PSVI through the <see langword="SchemaInfo" /> property of a reader.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过读取器的 <see langword="SchemaInfo" /> 属性获取 PSVI。

trans-unit.source: The validating reader that is created through <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.ValidationType" /> property set to <see cref="F:System.Xml.ValidationType.Schema" /> has complete PSVI for an element only when the reader is positioned on the end tag of an element.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create" /> 并使用设置为 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.ValidationType" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Xml.ValidationType.Schema" /> 属性创建的验证读取器具有完整的 PSVI，仅在将读取器放置在元素的结束标记处时，此 PSVI 才对元素可用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo> interface exposes a subset of the Post Schema Validation Infoset (PSVI) associated with an XML node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.IXmlSchemaInfo>接口中公开一部分的后架构验证信息集 (PSVI) 与 XML 节点相关联。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> object used to create this <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建此 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> object used to create this reader instance.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建此读取器实例的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If this reader was not created using the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create" /> method, this property returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此读取器不是使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create" /> 方法创建的，则此属性返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>对象可以包含敏感信息，例如用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: Applications must be careful when caching this object or passing it to another component.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序时一定要谨慎缓存此对象或将其传递到另一个组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> class is used to specify the set of features to support on the created reader instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>类用于指定要在创建读取器实例上支持的功能集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object returned by this property cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>无法修改此属性返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to change individual settings results in an exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 任何尝试更改单个设置导致引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Skips the children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 跳过当前节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: In the following XML input if the reader is positioned on the `<a>` node or any of its attributes, calling `Skip` positions the reader to the `<b>` node.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的 XML 输入是否读取器定位在`<a>`节点或任何其属性、 调用`Skip`到读取器定位`<b>`节点。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node already (such as the `<x>` node or the text node `abc`), calling `Skip` is the same as calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在叶节点上已 (如`<x>`节点或文本节点`abc`)，则调用`Skip`等同于调用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会检查格式正确的 XML。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, this method also validates the skipped content.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，此方法还将验证已跳过的内容。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlReader` implementation determines whether or not the `Skip` method will expand external entities.
trans-unit.target: `XmlReader`实现确定是否`Skip`方法将扩展外部实体。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes whether the external entities are expanded for the various types of `XmlReader` objects.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了是否为各种类型的扩展外部实体`XmlReader`对象。

trans-unit.source: Type of XmlReader
trans-unit.target: XmlReader 的类型

trans-unit.source: Expands external entities
trans-unit.target: 将扩展外部实体

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不是。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method that is reading text data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>正在读取的文本数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不是。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method that is reading binary data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>正在读取的二进制数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不适用。

trans-unit.source: A schema validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance created by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 架构验证<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>而创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance returned by a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 返回实例<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>对象。

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不适用。

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: 不是。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance wrapped around another <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 实例包装在另一个<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>实例。

trans-unit.source: Depends on the implementation of the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 取决于基础的实现<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: (The `Skip` method on the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is called).
trans-unit.target: (`Skip`方法对基础<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>称为)。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this method, see <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.SkipAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.SkipAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses an XML file starting on the second book node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例分析 XML 文件的第二个 book 节点上启动。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `2books.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用文件，`2books.xml`作为输入。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously skips the children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 异步跳过当前节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: The current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous version of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Skip%2A>, with the same functionality.
trans-unit.target: 这是异步版本<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Skip%2A>，具有相同功能。

trans-unit.source: To use this method, you must set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此方法，必须设置<xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async%2A>标志切换为`true`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> asynchronous method was called without setting the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> flag to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 异步方法，但未将 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Async" /> 标志设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，将引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“若要使用 Async 方法，请将 XmlReaderSettings.Async 设置为 True。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the text value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取当前节点的文本值。

trans-unit.source: The value returned depends on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" /> of the node.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值取决于节点的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlReader.NodeType" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists node types that have a value to return.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出具有要返回的值的节点类型。

trans-unit.source: All other node types return <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他节点类型返回 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Node type
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 节点类型

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Value
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 值

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="Attribute" /></term><description> The value of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see langword="Attribute" /></term><description> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="CDATA" /></term><description> The content of the CDATA section.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="CDATA" /></term><description> CDATA 节的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Comment" /></term><description> The content of the comment.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Comment" /></term><description> 注释的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="DocumentType" /></term><description> The internal subset.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="DocumentType" /></term><description> 内部子集。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="ProcessingInstruction" /></term><description> The entire content, excluding the target.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="ProcessingInstruction" /></term><description> 整个内容 （不包括目标）。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="SignificantWhitespace" /></term><description> The white space between markup in a mixed content model.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="SignificantWhitespace" /></term><description> 在混合内容模型中的标记之间的空白。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Text" /></term><description> The content of the text node.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Text" /></term><description> 文本节点的内容。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Whitespace" /></term><description> The white space between markup.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Whitespace" /></term><description> 标记之间的空白。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="XmlDeclaration" /></term><description> The content of the declaration.
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="XmlDeclaration" /></term><description> 声明的内容。

trans-unit.source: For the asynchronous version of this property, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetValueAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的异步版本，请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetValueAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an XML file and displays each of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例读取 XML 文件，并显示每个节点。

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the `items.xml` file.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用`items.xml`文件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Gets The Common Language Runtime (CLR) type for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型。

trans-unit.source: The CLR type that corresponds to the typed value of the node.
trans-unit.target: 与节点的类型化值对应的 CLR 类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: See [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md) for a list of the default mappings.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[System.Xml 类中的类型支持](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)有关默认映射的列表。

trans-unit.source: An element of type `xs:int` has a `ValueType` of `System.Int32` by default.
trans-unit.target: 类型的元素`xs:int`具有`ValueType`的`System.Int32`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: However, the `ValueType` could be one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as `System.Int16` or `System.Double`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`ValueType`可能是一种有效类型可以映射到`xs:int`，如`System.Int16`或`System.Double`。

trans-unit.source: If a node is un-typed, or if the node is an element that contains mixed content, the node value is mapped to the `System.String` type.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点为非类型化，或如果该节点是包含混合的内容的元素，节点值映射到`System.String`类型。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: Implementers must provide a <see langword="ValueType" /> for every node, even if it is only the <see langword="System.String" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 实施者必须提供<see langword="ValueType" />的每个节点，即使它只是<see langword="System.String" />类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取当前的 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 范围。

trans-unit.source: The current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 范围。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the `xml:lang` scope within which the current node resides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示`xml:lang`中当前节点所在作用域。

trans-unit.source: For example, here is an XML fragment with `xml:lang` set to US English in the root element:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面是与 XML 片段`xml:lang`设置为英语 （美国） 的根元素中：

trans-unit.source: When the reader is positioned on the `name` element, you can use this property to find that it is in the scope of a US English `xml:lang` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当读取器定位在`name`元素，你可以使用此属性来发现它是否在美国英语的作用域`xml:lang`属性。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlLang%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for an example of using this property.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlLang%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>有关使用此属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current <see langword="xml:space" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中被重写时，获取当前的 <see langword="xml:space" /> 范围。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If no <see langword="xml:space" /> scope exists, this property defaults to <see langword="XmlSpace.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何 <see langword="xml:space" /> 范围，则该属性默认值为 <see langword="XmlSpace.None" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlSpace%2A> (in the `XmlTextReader` class) for an example using this property.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlSpace%2A>(在`XmlTextReader`类) 使用此属性的示例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.
trans-unit.target: 在上一次异步操作完成之前调用了 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，会引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> 并显示消息“异步操作已在进行中。”
